snippet: Milan has entered a legal battle over traffic control. But gridlock is a global problem. Here is a collection of curated videos showing snarls, backups and standstills around the world.
lead_paragraph: Milan has entered a legal battle over traffic control. But gridlock is a global problem. Here is a collection of curated videos showing snarls, backups and standstills around the world.

headline.main: Traffic Jams Aggravate Around the World
